Articles.Content: I have been around since at least .17 or earlier I cant even remember, why do my posts have to be approved by a moderator? I cant find a reason in any of the forum faqs or rules.

Hi.

As you can see, you have very few posts in the forums. So, while you might have registered last year sometime, you haven't done much since then, and don't have the post count to come out of the mod queue just yet. No worries though, it shouldn't take too long. You can read more about how the forum works with stupid_chris' excellent FAQ here, including answers about the Curious George usergroup that you are currently in.

Hope that helps. And welcome to the forums.
